name: Apex Legends
description: A battle royale shooter game where competitors battle for glory, fame, and fortune.

name: CS: GO
description: A multiplayer tactical first person shooter game with a large set of maps, characters, weapons, and game play modes.

name: Fallout 4
description: A post-apocalyptic role-playing game that's the 5th major installment of the Fallout series with the story taking place 10 years after Fallout 3.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
description: An immersive, open-world action role-playing game set in the magical world of Harry Potter.

name: Overwatch 2
description: A team-based action game set in the future where players battle in 5 vs. 5 teams.

name: Roblox
description: An interactive gaming universe that lets players create, share experiences with friends and do anything they can imagine.

name: Rocket League
description: A hybrid game that combines arcade-style soccer and vehicular derby.

name: Smite
description: A third-person multiplayer online battle arena game.

name: Valorant
description: A 5 vs. 5 character-based tactical first person shooter game.

name: World of Warcraft
description: A MMORPG set in the magical world of Azeroth.
